text: The Quick Gun is a 1964 American western movie. It was directed by Sidney Salkow. The movie is based on the short story The Fastest Gun by Steve Fisher. It stars Audie Murphy, Walter Sande, Merry Anders, and Ted de Corsia. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1964 movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Movies directed by Sidney Salkow
title: The Quick Gun
